10th-graders set new record on MCAS

Nearly 90 percent of high school sophomores scored proficient in English on the latest round of the MCAS tests, education officials said today. (Globe)

The Bedford company behind the Roomba vacuum cleaner announced that it would buy Evolution Robotics, which sells robots that clean wood floors. (Globe)
